name: A Framework for Three Laws of Robotics
short_description:
A Framework for Implementing Three Laws of Robotics.
It is based on my ongoing PhD research on that topic.
See roland.pri.ee/doktor and roland.pri.ee/wiki/doktor for more details.
The system implements a parser for a declarative language and a planner
